mapper.update: update drug_condition_list set CONDITION_TYPE = #{conditionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONDITION_PART = #{conditionPart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRUG_ID = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRUG_TYPE = #{drugType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_QTY = #{unitQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONDITION_SUB_IDX = #{conditionSubIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DRUG_SEQ_ID = #{drugSeqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select DRUG_SEQ_ID, CONDITION_TYPE, CONDITION_PART, DRUG_ID, DRUG_TYPE, UNIT_QTY, CONDITION_SUB_IDX from drug_condition_list where DRUG_SEQ_ID = #{drugSeqId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select DRUG_SEQ_ID, CONDITION_TYPE, CONDITION_PART, DRUG_ID, DRUG_TYPE, UNIT_QTY, CONDITION_SUB_IDX from drug_condition_list
